name: CNR_COMP_INFO
description: The no-add single response data for the Compounding and Repackaging (CNR) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of a Compounding and Repackaging record. Compounding and repackaging records represent the products created when pharmacists combine multiple medications to create a new medication or take one medication from a container and place it into another container.

columns.name: RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Compounding and Repackaging record. Compounding and repackaging records represent the products created when pharmacists combine multiple medications to create a new medication or take one medication from a container and place it into another container.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Compounding and Repackaging record. Compounding and repackaging records represent the products created when pharmacists combine multiple medications to create a new medication or take one medication from a container and place it into another container.
